title: So I was playing Battleborn Beta
body:
I was playing a melee character and we had a healer, I simply said over mic "Healer heal me so I can go deep"

Instantly began receiving the healers focus and destroyed the enemy team, was incredibly satisfying as my character was also a heavy lifesteal fighter with heavy damage, kind of like a yasuo with bloodthirster.

Why league doesn't have voice chat I'll never know.

Without voice chat this would have been impossible to orchestrate and I would have died very fast.
